mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_important = #{isImportant}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no, n.title, n.content, n.author_member_no, n.is_important, n.view_count, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as author_name, m.id as author_id FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.author_member_no = m.member_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}

SELECT n.notice_no, n.title, n.content, n.author_member_no, n.is_important, n.view_count, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as author_name, m.id as author_id FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.author_member_no = m.member_no ORDER BY n.is_important DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_no, n.title, n.content, n.author_member_no, n.is_important, n.view_count, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as author_name, m.id as author_id FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.author_member_no = m.member_no WHERE n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY n.is_important DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_no, n.title, n.content, n.author_member_no, n.is_important, n.view_count, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as author_name, m.id as author_id FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.author_member_no = m.member_no ORDER BY n.is_important DESC, n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
